revised_title: Supplement to a Former Paper on Trichophyton tonsurans and a New Form of Spectroscope
tldr: The author investigates the growth of Trichophyton tonsurans using gelatinised meat juice and discovers that it grows even when submerged in the medium. The author also describes a new form of spectroscope using a half-cut grating for observing metallic prominences and sunspots.
